title: [1.12.2][Emoticons-动作表情动画]
author: Black小衰
txt_content:
本帖最后由 837232423 于 2020-5-10 21:00 编辑 

Emoticons-动作表情这个MOD可以使玩家做出动作表情，有点类似Emotes+Mo' Bends，目前有三十多种动作
使用说明默认小键盘“1-4”是动作键“P”键是菜单，可以更改动作键绑定的动作【必看】必须先安装McHorse's McLib前置才能使用此mod（由@渣滓SYT 的补充：这个插件并不兼容时装工坊，作者在discord说过永不支持）
安装说明首先下载McHorse's McLib前置和Emoticons然后直接把两个mod放入文件夹即可[旧]安装说明以下为以前的安装方法，因作者取消了获取key激活，所以已没用，留下来以防万一首先把MOD拉入mods文件夹里然后去这个网站： (网站已经没了)，输入你的游戏ID或者是正版账号的UUID输完点击Generate按钮获取一个user.txt文件把user.txt文件放到游戏目录.minecraft/config/emoticons/文件夹内(没有emoticons文件夹的话就自己创建一个)下载地址官网下载地址：EmoticonsCurseForge下载地址：EmoticonsMcHorse's McLib前置下载地址：McHorse's McLib网盘(备用)：网盘链接（提取码: hpvt ）（很多人原贴下不了，所以我添加了网盘地址但不一定会及时更新，想下最新版本的建议还是去原贴下载吧）图片展示部分动作
移动效果
在第一人称下，右上角会显示你当前的动作(如果没在做动作或不是第一人称则不显示)
设置界面更新日志版本：0.4.3  更新日期：2020/3/07这次更新修复了与Optifine一起使用时，模型会出现透明性的问题，因为Optifine更改了混合函数smh。
与McLib 1.0.4兼容，并可选与Blockbuster 1.6.4和Metamorph 1.1.10兼容。 这并不意味着将来的McLib，Blockbuster和Metamorph版本将不兼容，但是较旧的版本很可能不兼容。
修复了由于Optifine无法清除其OpenGL状态而导致的半透明模型This hot patch update fixes stupid transparency issue with model when used with Optifine, because Optifine changes blending function smh.

Compatible with McLib 1.0.4 and optionally with Blockbuster 1.6.4 and Metamorph 1.1.10. It doesn't mean that future versions of McLib, Blockbuster and Metamorph would be incompatible, but older versions are most likely incompatible.

Fixed semi-transparent model due to Optifine not cleaning up its OpenGL state
版本：0.4.2   更新日期：2020/3/07此更新修复了多人服务器的一些问题
在姿势编辑器中为特定骨骼添加了复选框“固定移动”增加了新的动作动画（游泳，着陆和死亡）修正了玩家在隐身效果下会显示模型渲染的问题修复了盔甲架会被渲染并可以透过方块看到的问题修复了动画姿势不适用于无姿势变形的问题修复有旋转问题的车（直升机旋转）This update fixes a couple of issues with multiplayer servers ("wallhack" aka F3 skeleton rendering through walls and invisibility potions).

Compatible with McLib 1.0.4 and optionally with Blockbuster 1.6.4 and Metamorph 1.1.10. It doesn't mean that future versions of McLib, Blockbuster and Metamorph would be incompatible, but older versions are most likely incompatible.

Added a check box "Fixate movement" for specific bone in pose editor
Added new Nazzy's animations (swimming, landing and dying)
Fixed model getting rendered when player under invisibility effect
Fixed armature being rendered and acting as a wall hack
Fixed animated poses not working with poseless morph
Fixed vehicle causing rotation issues (helicopter spinning)
版本：0.4.1   更新日期：2020/2/12这个小小的补丁更新使Emoticons可以和Blockbuster 1.6.4一起使用。修复了使用Blockbuster时会产生崩溃This tiny patch update makes Emoticons work with Blockbuster 1.6.4.

Compatible with McLib 1.0.4 and optionally with Blockbuster 1.6.4 and Metamorph 1.1.10. It doesn't mean that future versions of McLib, Blockbuster and Metamorph would be incompatible, but older versions are most likely incompatible.

Fixed a crash with Blockbuster 1.6.4
版本：0.4   更新日期：2020/1/4这次小更新添加了9个不同的表情并修复了几个bug增加了9个新的表情：Bongo Cat（打鼓猫），惊人，恶心，疲惫，拳击，拍打，打喷嚏，威胁和哇哦
目前与mclib1.0.4版本兼容，也与Blockbuster[单人短片工作室模组]1.6.2版本和Metamorph(变形)1.1.10版本兼容(这里版本指的是Mod版本)并不是指与mclib、Blockbuster和Metamorph它们之后的新版本会不兼容，但旧的版本很可能会不兼容。
修复/改善玩家动画固定坐姿朝向一个方向，椅子来自其他模块This small update that adds 9 different emote and fixes a couple of bugs.

Compatible with McLib 1.0.4 and optionally with Blockbuster 1.6.2 and Metamorph 1.1.10. It doesn't mean that future versions of McLib, Blockbuster and Metamorph would be incompatible, but older versions are most likely incompatible.

Added 9 new emotes: Bongo Cat, Breathtaking, Disgusted, Exhausted, Punch!, Slap, Sneeze, Threatening and Woah
Fixed/improve player animation by fixing bezier function to work correctly
Fixed sitting oriented toward one direction with chairs from other mods
版本：0.3.2   更新日期：2019/09/30这个小补丁更新提供了由Nazzy和Moris制作的新表情动画，此外它还修复了一个与PlayerRevive(玩家救援)MOD兼容的问题。添加了新的动画（由Nazzy和Moris制作）通过部分重写和文件管理来减小文件大小修复了使用PlayerReviveMOD时的玩家死亡后不会正常躺在地上的问题This small patch update provides new emote animations made by Nazzy and Moris, beside that it also fixes one mod compatibility issue with PlayerRevive mod.

Compatible with McLib 1.0.3 and optionally with Blockbuster 1.6 and Metamorph 1.1.8. It doesn't mean that future versions of McLib, Blockbuster and Metamorph would be incompatible, but older versions are most likely incompatible.

Added new non-emote animations (which are made by Nazzy and Moris)
Decresed the file size by doing some internal rewriting and file management
Fixed player not lying on the ground when using PlayerRevive mod by CreativeMD

版本：0.3.1   更新日期：2019/09/30这次更新修复了emote同步的几个问题。同样与mclib1.0.3版本兼容，也可选择与Blockbuster[单人短片工作室模组]1.6版本和Metamorph(变形)1.1.8版本兼容添加自定义有效负载频道表情符号（发送<player_username>以建立连接，发送<player_username><emote_id>以发送表情符号播放）（这里我不太懂，游戏里也不知道怎么用）修复了正确的名称标记（不仅是名称，还有服务器端格式，如果有的话）修正了玩家死亡或传送到另一个世界后，emote服务器同步不工作的问题已修复/删除服务器上无法使用的命令。修正了Blockbuster的emote动作与Blockbuster的身体演员不起作用的问题This patch update fixes few issues with emote synchronization.

Compatible with McLib 1.0.3 and optionally with Blockbuster 1.6 and Metamorph 1.1.8. It doesn't mean that future versions of McLib, Blockbuster and Metamorph would be incompatible, but older versions are most likely incompatible.

Added custom payload channel Emoticons (send <player_username> to establish connection, and <player_username> <emote_id> to send the emote playing)
Fixed proper name tag rendering (not just the name but also server side formatting, if there is any)
Fixed emote server synchronization not working after player dies or goes to another dimension
Fixed /emote commmand not working on the server.
Fixed Blockbuster emote action not working with Blockbuster's body actors

版本：0.3.0   更新日期：2019/08/17与mclib1.0.3版本兼容，也可选择与Blockbuster[单人短片工作室模组]1.6版本和Metamorph(变形)1.1.8版本兼容（注意：这里的版本是指MOD的版本不是指Minecraft的版本）。(这里版本指的是Mod版本)并不是指与mclib、Blockbuster和Metamorph它们之后的新版本会不兼容，但旧的版本很可能会不兼容。
添加了新的动作：Get Funky, Free Flow, Shimmer, Twerk and Clubbing添加了新的MOD依赖项：mclib增加了简化模型添加了禁用声音事件注册的配置选项为Emoticons模组增加了2个按键绑定为Emoticons模组添加了编辑器以支持动作形态的完整配置为Emoticons模组添加了动画姿势更改了不同的模型渲染方法修复了一些严重的图形驱动程序崩溃的问题修复了在服务器使用以及使用Metamorph模组造成的崩溃问题This long update took long quite long to get finished, and I don't think I actually got done anything finished, but here we go.

Compatible with McLib 1.0.3, and optionally with Blockbuster 1.6 and Metamorph 1.1.8. It doesn't mean that future versions of McLib, Blockbuster and Metamorph would be incompatible, but older versions are most likely incompatible.

Added new emotes: Get Funky, Free Flow, Shimmer, Twerk and Clubbing
Added new mod dependency McLib
Added simplified models
Added config option to disable sound event registering
Added 2 more emote keybinds
Added Emoticons morph editor to support full configuration of morphs
Added Emoticons morph animated poses
Changed different model shading method
Fixed crash with some strict graphics card drivers
Fixed crash with dedicated server and morphs

版本：0.2.1   更新日期：2019/01/17作者把MOD上传到了CurseForge上，并且把需要获取key激活这一步骤取消了，现在直接放MODS文件夹里就能用了
版本：0.2.1   更新日期：2018/12/03这次更新有了重要的调整，它删除了F1键的水印，修复了在表情符号过程中没有显示的dying动画，为舞蹈添加了空的声音事件，在配置菜单中添加了一个选项来禁用非表情动画，减小了jar的文件大小，最后，在崩溃屏幕上添加了额外的信息(这样你就可以很容易地明白，你需要key才能继续使用)。Third update. This quick patch provides few important tweaks, it removed the F1 watermark, fixes dying animation not showing up during emote, adds empty sound events for dances, adds an option in emote configuration menu to disable non-emote animations, decreased the file size of the jar, and finally added extra information on the crash screen (so it would be easy to understand what's going on with access key).

版本：0.2   更新日期：2018/11/06这次更新增加了10个新的表情，支持普通铠甲，并增加按键键绑定，以允许随时切换表情（而不是一个表情结束后才能使用下一个表情）。Second update. This update adds 10 new emotes, support for vanilla armor, and tweaks the key binds to allow instant switch of an emote (instead of moving or pressing stop emote key).

版本：0.1   更新日期：2018/10/24增加了自定义播放器动画和表情系统，具有超过25个表情（来源于自制，部分来自于堡垒之夜）。Initial release. It adds custom player animations and emote system, featuring over 25 emotes (custom and from Fortnite). Change log video.

F&Q翻译F.A.Q.问：你能为“表情”添加自定义音乐吗？答：不，因为我没有时间或能力为每一个表情制作合适的曲调，而且如果我使用原始的音频，那将是非法的。但是，您可以创建自己的自定义资源包或将声音放到表情符号的jar中，并替换表情符号的声音事件。
问：我不喜欢Emoticons的动画，但是Emoticons很酷。我可以禁用它们吗？答：您可以在emote 0.2.1的配置菜单中禁用它们。
问：我在服务器上和朋友玩，为什么我看不到他们的表情，或者他们看不到我的表情？答：为了能看到其他人的表情，服务器也必须安装mod。服务器上没有mod，没有人能看到表情。
问：你能增加对某个MOD的支持吗？答：不，我不会增加某个MOD的支持。这个模型是为了好玩，我不想把它变成我的工作。
问：我可以自己添加自定义的emotes表情吗？不，你不能。
问：你会给MOD更新1.7.10、1.8或1.9的版本吗？答：不，这些版本不受Forge支持，并且通常已失效。
问：你会把mod升级到1.10.2或是1.11.2吗？答：除非有很多人需求。
问：你会把mod升级到1.13或更高版本吗？答：最有可能的，一旦Forge达到1.13或以上就可能会升级。原文F.A.Q.Q: Can you add custom music to emotes? 
A: No, because I have no time/skill to make cool tunes for every emote, and if I use the original audio that would be illegal. However, you can make your own custom resource pack or place the sounds to Emoticons' jar, and replace the emoticons sound events.
Q: I don't like Emoticons' animations, but emotes are very cool. Can I disable them? 
A: You can disable them in 0.2.1 in the emote configuration menu.
Q: I'm playing with my friends on the server, and why I can't see them emote, or they can't see me emote? 
A: In order to see other people emote, the server must also install the mod. No mod on the server, no people emoting.
Q: Can you add support with mod X? 
A: No, I won't add support with any other mods. This mod was made for fun, I don't want to turn it into my job.
Q: Can I add custom emotes myself? 
A: No, you can't.
Q: Will you upgrade mod to 1.7.10, 1.8 or 1.9? 
A: No, those versions are not supported by Forge, and generally dead.
Q: Will you upgrade mod to 1.10.2 or 1.11.2? 
A: Only if there will be a big demand.
Q: Will you upgrade mod to 1.13 or up? 
A: Most likely once Forge for 1.13 or above will come up.

之后可能没时间了，不再更新。请有能力者二搬吧
